document.full_text: jacques lemaire has decided to step down as head coach of the new jersey devils on sunday after returning to the team in december to help turn around what was a dismal start to the nhl season.
document.title: devils coach lemaire says not returning next season
lines_and_colors: jacques lemaire has decided to step down as head coach of the new jersey devils on sunday after returning to the team in december to help turn around what was a dismal start to the nhl season.
